------------ Game Setup ------------
Supply cards: Native Village, Squire, Moneylender, Cache, Explorer, Festival, Governor, Highway, Rebuild, Stables, Copper, Silver, Gold, Estate, Duchy, Province, Curse
MadisonMom - starting cards: Necropolis, Overgrown Estate, Hovel, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
aoe_conqueror - starting cards: Necropolis, Overgrown Estate, Hovel, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
MadisonMom - shuffles deck
aoe_conqueror - shuffles deck
MadisonMom - draws Copper, Copper, Necropolis, Copper, Hovel
aoe_conqueror - draws Copper, Hovel, Copper, Overgrown Estate, Copper
 
---------- MadisonMom: turn 1 ----------
MadisonMom - plays Necropolis
MadisonMom - plays 3 Copper
MadisonMom - buys Squire
MadisonMom - gains Squire
MadisonMom - draws Overgrown Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
 
---------- aoe_conqueror: turn 1 ----------
aoe_conqueror - plays 3 Copper
aoe_conqueror - buys Silver
aoe_conqueror - gains Silver
aoe_conqueror - draws Copper, Copper, Necropolis, Copper, Copper
 
---------- MadisonMom: turn 2 ----------
MadisonMom - plays 4 Copper
MadisonMom - buys Moneylender
MadisonMom - gains Moneylender
MadisonMom - shuffles deck
MadisonMom - draws Moneylender, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
 
---------- aoe_conqueror: turn 2 ----------
aoe_conqueror - plays 4 Copper
aoe_conqueror - buys Moneylender
aoe_conqueror - gains Moneylender
aoe_conqueror - shuffles deck
aoe_conqueror - draws Silver, Hovel, Copper, Copper, Necropolis
 
---------- MadisonMom: turn 3 ----------
MadisonMom - plays Moneylender
MadisonMom - trashes Copper
MadisonMom - plays 3 Copper
MadisonMom - buys Gold
MadisonMom - gains Gold
MadisonMom - draws Copper, Copper, Squire, Copper, Necropolis
 
---------- aoe_conqueror: turn 3 ----------
aoe_conqueror - plays 2 Copper, 1 Silver
aoe_conqueror - buys Silver
aoe_conqueror - gains Silver

------------ Game Over ------------
MadisonMom - cards: 4 Governor, 1 Rebuild, 1 Necropolis, 1 Moneylender, 1 Squire, 3 Silver, 2 Gold, 5 Province, 3 Estate, 3 Duchy
MadisonMom - total victory points: 42
MadisonMom - turns: 17
 
aoe_conqueror - cards: 6 Highway, 2 Moneylender, 2 Festival, 1 Squire, 1 Rebuild, 3 Gold, 2 Silver, 1 Copper, 3 Province, 2 Estate
